to.sven.androidrccar.host.communication.contract

Interface ISocketConnector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SocketConnector

    public interface ISocketConnector
    The socket connector listens for a connecting client application.
    Author:
    sven

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      Cancel listening, if listening is running.
      boolean finishedListening()
      Returns true, if listen() was called and somebody has connected.
      ConnectionParameter getConnectionDetails()
      Returns the connection details for connecting to the socket
      void listen()
      Start listen for a connecting client application.

    • Method Detail

      • listen

        void listen()
        Start listen for a connecting client application. May be called only once time.

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        Cancel listening, if listening is running.

      • getConnectionDetails

        ConnectionParameter getConnectionDetails()
        Returns the connection details for connecting to the socket
        Returns:
        ConnectionParameter

      • finishedListening

        boolean finishedListening()
        Returns true, if listen() was called and somebody has connected.
        Returns:
        True, if somebody has connected.
